danceFeedbackDidntPress: Me pēhi i ngā pātuhi pere i te wā e haere ana tō kanikani.
danceFeedbackKeepCoding: Kia kaha te waehere mai! Kāore anō kia tino tika.
danceFeedbackKeyEvent: Me hono e koe he waehere ki te paraka <xml></block><block type="Dancelab_whenKey"><title name="KEY">"ki runga"</title></block></xml> ā, pana i te pātene i a te kanikani i te haere.
danceFeedbackNeedBackup: Me hanga e koe tētahi rōpū kaitautoko kanikani mā te paraka <xml><block type="Dancelab_makeNewDanceSpriteGroup"><title name="N">10</title><title name="COSTUME">"UNICORN"</title><title name="LAYOUT">"circle"</title></block></xml>.
danceFeedbackNeedDifferentDance: Me whakamahi koe i tētahi kanikani kē.
danceFeedbackNeedEveryTwoMeasures: Me whakamahi koe i te paraka `ia wāhanga e rua`,
danceFeedbackNeedLead: Me hanga e koe kia kotahi te kaitātaki kaikanikani mā te paraka <xml><block type="Dancelab_makeAnonymousDanceSprite"><title name="COSTUME">???</title><title name="LOCATION">'{'x: 200, y: 200'}'</title></block></xml>.
danceFeedbackNeedMakeANewDancer: Whakamahia te paraka `he mea hou` ki te waihanga i te kaikanikani tuarua.
danceFeedbackNeedNewDancer: Me hanga koe i tetahi kaikanikani.
danceFeedbackNeedTwoDancers: Me hanga koe kia rua ngā kaikanikani.
danceFeedbackOnlyOneDancerMoved: Kotahi anake o ō kaikanikani i neke.
danceFeedbackPressedKey: I pēhi koe i tētahi pātuhi, engari kāore i uruparetia e tō kaikanikani.
danceFeedbackSetSize: Me panoni koe i te nui o tētahi, ētahi rānei o ngā kaikanikani, a muri i te tīmatanga o te waiata.
danceFeedbackStartNewMove: E kore mahi to kaikanikani i teteahi nekehanga hou i muri i ngā wāhanga tuawha.
danceFeedbackTooManyDancers: Kia tūpato! In tuku ai koe i te paraka `he mea hou` kei roto i te `ia wāhanga e rua`, ka waihanga koe i te tokomaha o ngā kaikanikani.
danceFeedbackUseSetSize: Whakamahia i te paraka `set backup_dancer2 size` kia whakaiti i te rahi o to kaikanikani.
danceFeedbackUseSetTint: Whakamahia i te paraka `kowhiri te tae` ki te tini i te tae o te kaikanikani.
danceFeedbackUseStartMapping: Tapirihia te paraka<xml><block type="Dancelab_startMapping"><title name="SPRITE">mairetahi_matau</title><title name="PROPERTY">"āwhata"</title><title name="RANGE">"bass"</title></block></xml> ki o mahi.
